OOC Sounds good to me if Necromancers strong enough to carry  3 bots on his
back.

BIC Foxfingers runs up behind Necromancer "Hey wait up, I could use a ride
too."  Foxfingers stoops beside Dinobot and begins to stop the fluid loss.
"Don't be ridiculous my friend, we need each other and your ladyfriend can
be waited on later." Foxfingers didn't want to disagree with any bot twice
his size let alone one who turns into a hungry bloodthirsty carnivore but
this worked more to his advantage. this way he got close enough to the
dragon to serve his purposes.
----- Original Message -----
From: Carnage darkness <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 25, 2000 6:29 AM
Subject: Anger 2 Rage!





* Dinobot watched as Tavatron pulled her ears back, and also seemed to feel
her aggression in the air about the two warriors.
However, he also felt as if he was being watched from somewhere, across the
field perhaps?
He raised his one good optic towards the direction in which the glaring
feeling was coming from, only to lock optics with some sort of Alliance bot
half way across the field.
Dinobot narrowed his optics as he continued to glare in the direction of
Burning Hammer, a bot whom seemed as equally powerful as he at full
strength.one in which was worthy of a challenge.
A growl rumbled in his chest as he watched Burning Hammer stare back at him
for a few more moment before turning his back to the warrior's glare and
begin to walk back to base.
Without any reason at all Dinobot thought of a battle between the two of
them, one in which a possibility of that bots mutilation was likely.
Indeed, that bot seemed a worthy foe by simple sight alone, but a challenge
was indeed going to happen if they ever met up again and in better
condition.
Dinobot then looked at the disappearing figure of the Alliance bot for one
last moment before turning his attentions back to the aggression of
Tavatron.
His own temper on the edge and in the possibility of tipping.
He heard the growl begin to develop in her throat, his muscles tensing and
how brows furrowing into an angry glare, just daring her to say something
and push his anger into a state of rage.
He had had enough of her this night, with trying to save her from the
Alliance and then almost throwing his efforts and her safety away when
engaging in a battle.in which he had told her NOT to do.
But NO, she had ignored him and instead told HIM to flee.
But then her words came, just as he had dared them to. And he met them with
his own, but with rage instead of anger.
He took an aggressive step towards her and bared his teeth as he spoke his
voice a roar. *

" I SHOULD be speaking!!  My armor was taken in an act which has saved a
live, YOURS was taken in an act of STUPITITY  from not accepting good advice
when it was given!!
And at least I am not a COMPLETE FOOL and so much an INCOMPOTANT warrior
that I was STUPID enough to be caught by the Alliance and their childish
tricks!
So it is YOU whom have no right to speak, WENCH!!"

* Dinobot was in a complete rage, every one of his systems stressing and his
spark pounding in his head.
This woman had completely PISSED HIM OFF and he wasn't about to take it with
a dumb look, knowing that it was she whom was in the wrong on this matter.
However, in the state of aggression in which he dwelled in, he was in no
mood to think rationally and carefully about what he was saying.
And frankly, he didn't care!
However, he had caught himself in the last sentence of his words, for, he
almost called Tavatron a whore instead of a wench, something that he would
have dearly regretted.
And when Tavatron turned her head from him and towards Necromancer his rage
only built, wanting to grab her head and make her look at him. To know about
just how angry he was with her.
And it seemed, every single word out of her mouth annoyed, angered, and
completely raged him.even when they WEREN'T directed at him.
His tail thrashed and tore up earth as it slammed against the ground, just
as Tavatron looked back towards him.
She was walking?!!
How DARE she just walk away from an argument like this, when it hadn't even
began yet.
Dinobot growled loudly and took a few steps towards Tavatron as she walked
away, reaching out a clawed hand to snag her shoulder and whip her around to
face him, to face his words like a real warrior.
But just before he could get a hold on the fembots shoulder he was suddenly
hauled upright.
He gave a loud snarl of surprise before he was simply tossed onto
Necromancer's back.
Dinobot growled in annoyance and glared over the dragons' shoulder to stare
at his head.*

" What in the pit do you think you are doing?!"

* He then simply slid down off of Necromancer's back and onto the ground,
another wave of pain flashing through his body as his third fluid pump
deactivated.
Just GREAT! PERFECT!
Now he could slip into stasis lock any moment, and without him even knowing
it!
He growled and looked in Tavatron's general direction, seeing her get
blasted aside by a bot by the name of Catgut.
Perfect, now she was in trouble and he couldn't even do anything, just stand
there and watch with his circuits failing.
But then something else caught his attention, another bot.but this one was
closer.and by what he was hearing, friendly.
Dinobot leaned against Necromancer's side as his systems wavered and a wave
of nausea swept over him, making him lean more heavily.
This bot, in which he didn't know (Foxfinger) was offering him his help,
something that could be greatly used at the moment.but not by him.
He growled, it sounding a little wet thanks to more mech-fluid which coated
his throat.*

" Tavatron needs.back up. Assist her.*

* And that was all he could manage to say before he was forced to swallow a
mouthful of fluid as it gushed up from his throat.
Dinobot hung his head and bent, placing his hands on his knees to prevent
him from doubling over.
He could feel the stasis lock closing in, and if one more.just ONE MORE
fluid pump shut down he would die from lack of mech-fluid to the brain.
A slow and agonizing death.
But, Tavatron's safely came first, and he wasn't leaving willingly without
her!*
